From: KSLawdogg@...

Vehement:


On Cybertron...

Vehement walked up to the podium, dressed in a red robe with a black scythe 
emblem on the left pectoral side of the robe.  The nine foot robot raised 
both of his arms in the air.

"The Evil One smiles upon us today as our Brothers move in on the Maximal 
prison deep within the Cybertronian province of Polyhex!  We shall free over 
two hundred convicts, twenty-eight of them imprisoned members of our 
Brotherhood.  We estimate over fifty of the others shall join our righteous 
cause, and help us crush the heathens!"

A roar of cheering erupted from the crowd of over seventy robots in front of 
him, Maximal and Predacon alike.

"For the Evil One!"

"FOR THE EVIL ONE!" the crowd roared.

"I sha--" Vehement looked up as several figures smashed through the glass 
window, all on ropes with laser rifles in hand.  "Heathens!  Kill them!" 
Vehement said as he reached into his robe, producing a laser pistol.  
Pointing the barrel at one of the robots on a rope, he fired off a few bolts, 
laughing as the robot crashed to the ground in the middle of the crowd.

Vehement took off at a run as the other robots on ropes landed on the ground, 
opening fire at the armed members of the crowd.

---

Vehement ran passed several members of his Brotherhood, getting into a room 
full of screens, a few robots looking at them.
"Status report?"

"Not good, Archbishop Vehement.  Our forces are losing.  Maximals are pouring 
into all sections of the base."

"Ah.  I see." Vehement said, raising his pistol, firing off several bolts.  
He laughed as the bodies hit the ground.  Reaching into subspace, he produced 
a black square charge, tossing it in the middle of the room and walking out.  
He sighed as the device exploded, erupting the entire room in flames.

He walked on as a few Brotherhood members ran by him, heading for the flaming 
mess, a few of them calling out to him.
